title: Ellora's Cavemen: Tales from the Temple I
description: This book is no longer available. Please see individual author titles. Ravyn Wilde's story in this book was Adam & Eve, which is available as a standalone title. A special edition anthology of six sizzling stories from Ellora's Cave's Mistresses of Romantica (tm). Joshua 4.0 by Sahara Kelly Barbarian by Kate Douglas Manimal by Lani Aames A.D. 2203: Adam & Eve by Ravyn Wilde At His Mercy by Doreen DeSalvo Time-share: Amelia's Journey by Lora Leigh
author: Jaid Black
